channel.title: School Web Project
channel.description:
We've gotta create a dynamic PHP website using a MySQL database for our IT coursework, nothing too advanced because I'm teaching our teacher how to use PHP and MySQL from scratch and I don't want to go into massive details.
It's just got to be something I can write lots about (Analysis, Testing, Evaluation etc), not necessarily a brand spanking new idea that has never been done before.
Any ideas?

item.title: School Web Project
item.dc:creator: @inertia inertia
item.description:
@inertia wrote:

[quote=“abraham2119, post:2, topic:304763”]a simple page where one posts what they like, kind of like 4chan

you can make the posts appear dynamically once the user presses submit, and send info to the server through ajax. watch out for xss exploits though[/quote]

Could do, wouldn’t be much to write about on stuff like system lifecycles etc. The specification states that the system must be an improvement on a current (maybe manual) system in an organisation.

So I need something along the lines of an online store instead of a telephone store, but this would be too much work for what we need.

Read full topic
